content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are a student. Because you are a student, I can offer you a special discount. I usually rent this apartment for 800 euros per month, but I can offer you a 10% discount for being a student. So, I can offer you a price of 720 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I see, but I think we can do better than that. How about 900 euros per month? It's a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. A bargain for the quality and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Haoyu, I understand your position, but I think the price of 720 euros per month is very reasonable for a student. I have to consider my own financial situation as well. I can't afford to offer you a price lower than 720 euros per month.
[Answer]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but 720 euros per month is still quite high for me as a student. How about we meet in the middle? 550 euros per month sounds more reasonable for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 550 euros per month is too low for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The price of 720 euros per month is already quite reasonable considering its location and facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your explanation, but 720 euros per month is still too high for me. As a student, I have to consider my own financial situation. How about 600 euros per month? It's a fair price for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your financial situation, but 600 euros per month is still too low for this apartment. It's a great apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. How about we make it 650 euros per month? It's a fair price for the quality and location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 650 euros per month is a good compromise. I agree to the price of [x] Euro! where x=650
name: Haoyu Wang from China
